corrStrength.description: GIC correction will be stronger as corrStrength increases. 1.0 means full strength.

corrThresh1.description: if green differrence is larger than (corrThresh1 * current G)/512, the pixel will not be corrected.

corrThresh2.description: if green differrence is larger than (corrThresh2 * 16383)/512, the pixel will not be corrected.
